org.forgerock.openidm.auth.modules.oauth.resolvers

Interface OAuthResolver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OAuthResolverImpl

    public interface OAuthResolver
    Validation of OAuth access token verification. Validation of the access token is made by making a request to the identity provider to retrieve a user profile. if a user profile is returned we can be comfortable that that access token is valid for the identity provider and can continue the authentication flow. validateIdentity(String) performs all individual checks.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String AUTHENTICATION_ID
      Lookup key for the 'subject' of the user.
      static String USER_INFO_ENDPOINT
      Lookup key for the user info endpoint of the identity provider.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Returns identity provider for which this resolver will resolve identities.
      String getSubject()
      Returns the subject used to link the identity provider account to known account information.
      void validateIdentity(String accessToken)
      Validates the supplied access token against an identity provider(Idp).

      • validateIdentity

        void validateIdentity(String accessToken)
               throws OAuthVerificationException
        Validates the supplied access token against an identity provider(Idp).
        Parameters:
        accessToken - access token to verify
        Throws:
        OAuthVerificationException - if the accessToken is unable to be verified
